identity.name: Shvetha & Aadi - The Royal Union
identity.meta_description: A Sanjay Leela Bhansali inspired wedding collection platform. South Indian tradition meets cinematic grandeur.
identity.emotional_palette: The warmth of turmeric, the passion of sindoor, the richness of Kanjeevaram silk.

fonts.usage: Body text, UI elements, Buttons, Forms

primary.description: Deep Crimson / Sindoor Red - Used for CTAs, Headings, active states

secondary.description: Antique Gold - Used for borders, progress bars, accents, icons

layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-background shadow-2xl overflow-hidden relative border-x border-border/40

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-serif font-medium tracking-wide shadow-lg hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all hover:scale-[1.02]
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-secondary text-primary bg-transparent rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-serif font-medium hover:bg-secondary/10 transition-all
buttons.gold: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground rounded-full px-6 py-2 shadow-gold_glow hover:brightness-110

cards.pot: bg-surface rounded-xl border border-secondary/30 shadow-soft overflow-hidden relative group

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-secondary/30 rounded-none px-0 py-2 focus:border-secondary focus:ring-0 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/60 font-serif

patterns: Use subtle mandala SVG overlays on backgrounds with 5% opacity.
Add a 'Mango Motif' (Paisley) visual anchor in the corners of cards.

animations.loading: Animate a 'Diya' (Lamp) flame or a lotus blooming.
animations.scroll: Parallax effect on the hero image.
animations.hover: Cards should gently lift up (translate-y-1) and glow.

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure Gold text is only used on dark red backgrounds or dark charcoal backgrounds. Never use Gold on Ivory.
accessibility.focus_states: Use a double border (Gold + Red) for focus rings.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Tailwind Theme: Extend the tailwind.config.js with the custom colors (Ivory, Crimson, Gold) and Fonts.
2. Component Overrides: Customize shadcn components. Remove the default 'slate' look. Make dialogs Ivory with Gold borders.
3. Mobile Layout: Enforce the max-w-md mx-auto on the main app wrapper to simulate a mobile app experience on desktop view.
4. Admin Dashboard: Keep it cleaner but retain the fonts and color palette. Don't make it look like a generic admin panel.
5. Use 'Great Vibes' font for the 'Shvetha & Aadi' header logo to make it look like a signature.
